sentences.en: A federal marshal was killed in a shoot-out.
sentences.cn: 枪战中一名联邦警察局局长身亡。

sentences.en: A man was shot in the leg.
sentences.cn: 一个人被射中腿部。

sentences.en: A woman was shot dead in an attempted robbery.
sentences.cn: 一名女子在一桩未遂抢劫案中中枪身亡。

sentences.en: Don't shoot off your mouth if you don't know the facts.
sentences.cn: 不了解情况不要乱放炮.

sentences.en: Don’t shoot! I’m coming out with my hands up.
sentences.cn: 别开枪！ 我现在举起双手出来。

sentences.en: Drug addicts shoot up in the back alleys.
sentences.cn: 瘾君子们在后街小巷里注射毒品。

sentences.en: Giggs shot from the halfway line.
sentences.cn: 吉格斯在中线上射门。

sentences.en: he never shot a line about his escapades.
sentences.cn: 关于他的那些恶作剧，他始终闭口不谈。

sentences.en: He would rather shoot himself than compromise his principles.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿一枪打死自己也不愿违背自己的原则。

sentences.en: He'd love to shoot his film in Cuba.
sentences.cn: 他很乐意在古巴拍摄他的影片。

sentences.en: I also met with Pollack again to kind of shoot the bull.
sentences.cn: 我也再次和波拉克会面，两人闲聊了会儿。

sentences.en: I was shooting up cocaine.
sentences.cn: 当时我正在注射可卡因。

sentences.en: I went on a photo shoot to Rio with him.
sentences.cn: 我和他一起去里约拍照了。

sentences.en: I'll shoot some craps or play some blackjack.
sentences.cn: 我要掷几把骰子，玩几把21点纸牌。

sentences.en: If raging inflation returns, then interest rates will shoot up.
sentences.cn: 如果再发生严重的通货膨胀，那么利率就会迅速上调。

sentences.en: me wife's shot through and I can't pay the rent.
sentences.cn: 我老婆跑走了，我付不起房租。

sentences.en: Police shot one suspect when he pulled a gun on them.
sentences.cn: 警方在一名嫌疑人拔枪指着他们时击毙了他。

sentences.en: she went home and shot up alone in her room.
sentences.cn: 她回到家，一个人在房里注射毒品。

sentences.en: She's marvel to be able to shoot with such accuracy.
sentences.cn: 她的枪法那么好,真不简单.

sentences.en: shoot people up with the new chemical and see what happens.
sentences.cn: 给人注射新的化学药品，看看情况怎样。

sentences.en: shot down his theory.
sentences.cn: 批驳他的理论

sentences.en: shot down the proposal.
sentences.cn: 否决了这个建议

sentences.en: Smith killed his wife, and then shot himself.
sentences.cn: 史密斯杀死妻子，然后开枪自杀。

sentences.en: Spencer scuttled away from Singh to shoot wide when he should have scored.
sentences.cn: 斯宾塞快速晃开辛格却射门偏出，而他本应该得分的。

sentences.en: Tender green shoots will appear in February.
sentences.cn: 二月份就会长出绿色的嫩芽来。

sentences.en: The Danes won that UEFA tie in a shoot-out.
sentences.cn: 丹麦人在点球大战中胜出，赢下了那场欧洲杯淘汰赛。

sentences.en: The guards have orders to shoot intruders on sight (= shoot them as soon as they see them ) .
sentences.cn: 卫兵们奉命一见到有人闯入就开枪。

sentences.en: The police had orders to shoot anyone who attacked them.
sentences.cn: 警察接到命令可以枪击任何攻击他们的人。

sentences.en: the police shot up our building.
sentences.cn: 警察击毁了我们的大楼。

sentences.en: The red signal means you can shoot.
sentences.cn: 红色信号表示可以射击。

sentences.en: The soldiers had orders to shoot to kill (= shoot at someone with the intention of killing them ) .
sentences.cn: 士兵奉命开枪射杀。

sentences.en: This is just a toy gun─it doesn't shoot real bullets.
sentences.cn: 这只是一支玩具枪——不能射真子弹。

sentences.en: This scene is by no means easy to shoot.
sentences.cn: 这个镜头可不容易摄.

sentences.en: Three CBS cameramen were on site to shoot and edit taped reports.
sentences.cn: 3名哥伦比亚广播公司的摄影记者在现场拍摄并编辑录像报道。

sentences.en: troops shot down 28 demonstrators.
sentences.cn: 军队无情地击毙了28名示威者。

words.tran_cn: 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的
射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 拍摄一个镜头；拍摄电影
批驳：指出…为假；证明…是假的

phrases.phrase: shoot for  或 shoot at 【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 争取得到或追求…；以…为目标
（从夹克或大衣的袖口里）拉出衬衣的袖口
(非正式)对自己不利，砸自己的锅
(非正式)注射毒品；向…注射毒品
(澳/新西兰，非正式)（尤指为躲避而）离开
&I{【俚语】} 用静脉注射管注静毒品

trans.tran_en: the part of a plant that comes up above the ground when it is just beginning to grow, or a new part that grows on an existing plant

trans.tran_cn: 开枪，射击，发射，打猎，飞驰，剧痛跳窜，迅速地看，拍摄，射，投，玩，打
trans.tran_en: to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
to deliberately kill or injure someone using a gun
to kick or throw a ball in a sport such as football or  basketball  towards the place where you can get a point
